name: Turo
bossPosition: Vice President and Head of Government Relations
goal:
Turo is an online peer-to-peer car sharing platform, where individual car owners share their personal vehicle with other individuals.

Peer-to-peer car sharing is an mobility solution where individual car owners can share their personal vehicle on an online platform, such as Turo, and are able to earn some additional income to help recover the high cost of car ownership.

Through peer-to-peer car sharing, individuals who do not own a car are able to select the exact vehicle to fit their mobility needs, all while making existing vehicles more accessible and creating a new mobility solution.
interests: Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Environment, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Digital policy (platforms, digital services,...)
Urban mobility policy
Tax policy
